mapper.select: SELECT eo_api.apiSuccessMock FROM eo_api WHERE eo_api.projectID = #{projectID} AND eo_api.apiURI = #{apiURI} AND eo_api.apiRequestType = #{apiRequestType} AND eo_api.removed = 0 ORDER BY eo_api.apiUpdateTime DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT eo_api.apiFailureMock FROM eo_api WHERE eo_api.projectID = #{projectID} AND eo_api.apiURI = #{apiURI} AND eo_api.apiRequestType = #{apiRequestType} AND eo_api.removed = 0 ORDER BY eo_api.apiUpdateTime DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT eo_api.apiURI,eo_api.apiID,eo_api.apiSuccessMock,eo_api.apiFailureMock,eo_api.mockResult FROM eo_api WHERE eo_api.projectID = #{projectID} AND eo_api.removed = 0 AND eo_api.apiRequestType = #{apiRequestType} ORDER BY eo_api.apiUpdateTime DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT eo_api.mockResult FROM eo_api WHERE eo_api.projectID = #{projectID} AND eo_api.apiURI = #{apiURI} AND eo_api.apiRequestType = #{apiRequestType} AND eo_api.removed = 0 ORDER BY eo_api.apiUpdateTime DESC LIMIT 1
